item.title: Boris Johnson Resigns as UK Prime Minister
item.description: Boris Johnson Resigns as UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson resigned as Prime Minister of the United Kingdom on Thursday, after a series of scandals and controversies. Johnson said he was “sad to be giving up the best job in the world” but that it was “clearly the will of the parliamentary Conservative Party that there should be a new leader.
